data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Esmaeili-Rineh, Somayeh, Mirghaffari, Seyyed Ahmad, Sharifi, Mozafar (2017): The description of a new species of Niphargus from Iran based on morphological and molecular data. Subterranean Biology 22: 43-58, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.22.11286, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.22.11286
